name: Hamburg Südamerikanische Dampfschifffahrts-Gesellschaft A/S & Co KG
goal:
Hamburg Süd is a 100% subsidiary of Maersk Line A/S, belonging to A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S.
A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated container logistics company working to connect and simplify its customers’ supply chains. As the global leader in shipping services, the company operates in 130 countries and employs roughly 70,000 people.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Climate Policy
- European Environmental Policy
- European Maritime Policy
- European Ports Policy
- European Logistics Policy
- European Transportation Policy
- European Customs Policy
